cluster_information.name: Bridged Device Basic Information
cluster_information.description: This Cluster serves two purposes towards a Node communicating with a Bridge: indicate that the functionality on the Endpoint where it is placed (and its Parts) is bridged from a non-Matter technology, and provide a centralized collection of attributes that the Node MAY collect to aid in conveying information regarding the Bridged Device to a user.

attributes.name: VendorName
attributes.description: The vendor name in human readable text

attributes.name: ProductName
attributes.description: The product name in human readable text

attributes.name: NodeLabel
attributes.description: The Node Label assigned by the user

attributes.name: HardwareVersion
attributes.description: The hardware version of the bridged device

attributes.name: HardwareVersionString
attributes.description: The hardware version string of the bridged device

attributes.name: SoftwareVersion
attributes.description: The software version of the bridged device

attributes.name: SoftwareVersionString
attributes.description: The software version string of the bridged device

attributes.name: ManufacturingDate
attributes.description: The manufacturing date of the bridged device

attributes.name: PartNumber
attributes.description: The part number of the bridged device

attributes.name: ProductURL
attributes.description: The product URL of the bridged device

attributes.name: ProductLabel
attributes.description: The product label of the bridged device

attributes.name: SerialNumber
attributes.description: The serial number of the bridged device

attributes.name: Reachable
attributes.description: Indicates whether the bridged device is reachable

attributes.name: UniqueID
attributes.description: The unique identifier of the bridged device
